name: Crushing Thunder
description: Every time you play a total of 3 Action Cards, you will trigger Electro Cicin's effect on the opposing field. (+1 to Electro Cicin's Usage(s))
descriptionraw: Every time you play a total of 3 Action Cards, you will trigger <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C124041]</color>'s effect on the opposing field. (+1 to <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C124041]</color>'s $[K3])
descriptionreplaced: Every time you play a total of 3 Action Cards, you will trigger <color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Cicin</color>'s effect on the opposing field. (+1 to <color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Cicin</color>'s <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>)
